name: Beanstalkd.client
tagline: Yet another beanstalkd protocol 1.3 C# client.
body:
Beanstalkd.Client
=================

Yet another beanstalkd protocol 1.3 C# client. [https://github.com/kr/beanstalkd/blob/master/doc/protocol.txt] Current release: [v1.0.0.0-beta](https://github.com/bestmike007/Beanstalkd.Client/releases/tag/1.0.0.0)

Copyright Â© 2013 bestmike007.
See file LICENSE for terms of use.

Features
=================

+ Basic beanstalkd client
+ Managed beanstalkd client with auto-reconnect feature
+ Managed beanstalkd client pool (working on)
+ Managed beanstalkd client pool with multiple servers (wokring on)

Contributing
=================

1. Fork it.
2. Create a branch (`git checkout -b my_markup`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -am "Added Snarkdown"`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin my_markup`)
5. Open a [Pull Request][1]
6. Enjoy a refreshing Diet Coke and wait
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
